data.title: VIT Bhopal
data.meta_description: Best faculty of engineering and business school. many professors and assistant professors working hard.
data.text:
Curriculum Highlights: Cyber Crime, Warfare and Defense, Cyber Law and Ethical Hacking, Forensic Accounting & Fraud detection, Mobile Device Forensics, IoT Security, Artificial Intelligence in Cyber Forensics

Career Options: Military, Police, Intelligence, Law, Intelligence Agencies and Forensic labs, Financial Institutions (Banks, Payment Gateways), E-commerce portals, Social Media Companies (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.,), Software Security Companies (Antivirus/Firewall), Telecom, Airlines, Hospitals
